thread.section_title: Coronation Street cancer tragedy, family meltdown and killer attack: 10 big spoilers revealed – Metro
thread.title: Coronation Street cancer tragedy, family meltdown and killer attack: 10 big spoilers revealed
thread.title_full: Coronation Street cancer tragedy, family meltdown and killer attack: 10 big spoilers revealed

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Coronation Street cancer tragedy, family meltdown and killer attack: 10 big spoilers revealed
text:
(Picture: ITV) Prepare for tension, showdowns and heartbreak in Coronation Street as the Barlow family implode. As Peter’s life hits the rocks following Chloe’s lies, Daniel Osbourne and Sinead Tinker’s baby tragedy has far reaching consequences and Adam has a score to settle with Ken. As No.1 is rocked by serious conflicts, is there any way back for the family? 
It’s a Barlow-centric week but other characters get a look in too as Sally Metcalfe is given devastating news, killer Pat Phelan launches an attack on Todd Grimshaw and Jenny Bradley gets to work on her upcoming wedding.
Here is your in depth Weatherfield preview:
10 Corrie spoilers Peter contemplates hitting the bottle after Toyah leaves him in the wake of Chloe’s lies. Sally is given the shattering news that her cancer has return but later discovers that it’s a vicious prank. Ken masks his guilt as Daniel blames himself for Sinead’s miscarriage. Phelan launches himself at Todd as he winds him up about ghostly spirits. Seething Adam returns with a score to settle. Amy goes missing from her violin recital but what is she up to? Johnny suggests to Jenny that they set a date for their wedding in the summer. The Barlow family is rocked by a series of rows – can any of them come back from the conflict? Rosie is given a job offer that could help clear Kevin’s debts but Sophie has her doubts. Roy gives Brian his blessing for him to have a friendship with Cathy but do the pair want more? Monday 27th March Part One (Picture: ITV) 
Peter is left heartbroken when Toyah leaves him in the wake of Chloe’s lies and blames Ken. After watching Toyah head off in Toby’s car, a distraught Peter swipes a bottle of booze but will he fall off the wagon? Meanwhile Tracy accuses Ken of loving her and Amy less than his real kids.
Daniel opens up to Ken about feeling partly to blame for Sinead’s miscarriage, leaving Ken feeling guilty. Amy slips home during her violin recital but is caught in the act by Ken back home – what is she up to?
Ken tackles Phelan over the time it is taking to complete the kitchen while Phelan also launches himself at Todd and attacks him when he winds him up over ghostly spirits. Will he give his guilt away?
Monday 27th March Part Two The Barlows are in turmoil as Peter, Ken, Daniel and Tracy are embroiled in a series of rows while Peter faces temptation to hit the bottle. Toyah has a change of heart and decides that Peter needs her but can Toby change her mind and is she already too late? Sinead tells Daniel to accept his place at Oxford.
(Picture: ITV) Luke and Tracy search for Amy who lies that she has suffered stage fright while Adam menacingly eyes up No.1.
Wednesday 29th March Jenny recruits Sally for a radio interview about the mastectomy bras while Johnny suggests that he and Jenny get married in the summer, leaving her excitedly preparing for her big day.
Toyah, Leanne and Simon question Peter over whether he has been drinking but he denies it, saying that he was tempted after Chloe’s lies but resisted. Yasmeen engineers a theatre date between Brian and Cathy but Brian tells Roy that he is going to a talk on carbon emissions.
(Picture: ITV) Rosie and Sophie are worried to overhear Kevin talking about his debts and Rosie gets a lucrative glamour shoot offer which could help clear some of the money needed. But Sophie has strong doubts and advises her against it.
Friday 31st March Part One Sally feels proud as she gives a radio interview about her cancer battle and her family listen supportively to her. Later, though, she is left crushed when she receives a phone call from the hospital to say that her cancer has returned.
(Picture: ITV) Roy quizzes Brian on carbon emissions, leaving him flustered. Cathy asks Brian out again. Leanne reaches out to Toyah as she struggles to believe Peter while Fiz has an idea after giving Alya a massage.
Friday 31st March Part Two (Picture: ITV) Sally opens up to Tim about her fears over her cancer diagnosis but Rosie and Sophie discover a recording of the conversation with the hospital online and Sally realises that her troll has been behind a disgusting prank. A furious Tim discovers the extent of the harassment against Sally and tells her to delete her social media accounts.
Roy tackles Brian over his deception and tells him he is fine with him being friends with Cathy – but were they hoping for more?
Peter swears that he hasn’t cheated on Toyah or touched alcohol but will she believe him? Aidan is annoyed with Jenny for letting her wedding prep take over the workplace so she decides to wind him up further by asking Eva to help her with her dress.
Fiz tells Tyrone that she plans to take a night class in massage therapy.
